title: Cars - Gamecube
features: Story-based racing adventure game relives all the key moments of the movie
More than 10 playable characters from the film
Open world environment with more than 50 races
description: In Cars, you'll get a chance to live out the thrills and fun of the new Disney/Pixar animated film! Play as all your favurite characters from the movie, as you help Lightning McQueen capture the coveted Piston Cup Championship.
